articles.author: Lauren Haughey
articles.title: Experts warn millions are putting their WiFi router in the wrong place - here's where it SHOULD go - Daily Mail
articles.description: Moving your router away from electronic devices, microwaves and even Bluetooth equipment are among the numerous tricks that can boost your internet, according to Zen Internet .
articles.content:
Nothing is more frustrating than a buffering show at the pinnacle of its season finale.
But experts claim this can be fixed in just a few simple ways, as millions of us are putting our WiFi routers … [+6140 chars]
